summary: Skyrim have more encounters, and more various! You can find all types of bandits, forsworns, witches, warlocks, alik'rs, thalmors around Skyrim, not only in dungeons! Added also random silverhands encounters!
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim have more encounters, and more various! You can find all types of bandits, forsworns, witches, warlocks, alik'rs, thalmors around Skyrim, not only in dungeons! Added also random silverhands encounters!

New lists:
All bosses and standard enemies of:
bandit (melee 1h,melee 2h, missile, warlock)
forsworn (melee 1h, missile, dual wielding 1h, warlock)
witches and hags - there are no bosses (fire, storm, ice)
warlock (fire, storm, ice, conjurer, necromancer)
thalmor (melee 1h, missile , warlock)
alik'r (melee 1h, dual wielding 1h, missile)
vigilant of stendarr
silverhand - new! (melee 1h, melee 2h, missile)
werewolf
skeleton - new! added also skeleton warlocks! (melee 1h, melee 2h, melee 1h shield, missile, warlock)
draugr - yes, now also on the surface! (melee 1h, melee 2h, missile, warlock)
vampire
dremora - also improved gear and frequency! (melee 2h, missile, warlock)

==UPDATE 1.1

Added the "Addiction Probability", leveled lists to make sure that the player fights enemies of his same level with a greater probability
Added separately English and Italian versions
Fixed the frequency of skeletons and werewolves
Dremora no more drop random daedric weapons
Added: female skeleton archer, female skeleton 2h warrior and male deer
author: alfx3
